results.name: Number of permutations of 3 indistinguishable copies of 1,...,n such that the first and second copies of j are adjacent and there are exactly j-1 numbers between the second and the third copy of j.
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Langford's Problem
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Nov 22 2018
